subject: Re: Just teh fact!
author: babiarz3
full_text:
What you hear and the actual words being used are two different
things. Perception.


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:
>
> No, Chris is allowed to say he is talking to Barney for all I care.  
> What I hear him doing is telling others that he knows better than  
> they do. He does not. Period.
> 
> Ann
>
